SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.view.levels

Class LevelView

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.view.levels.LevelView
Direct Known Subclasses:
LevelFour, LevelOne, LevelThree, LevelTwo
public abstract class LevelView extends Object
Abstract base class for defining visuals and UI for game levels.

Includes functionality for managing background animations, player health, score display, progress tracking, and FPS monitoring.

  • Constructor Details

    • LevelView

      public LevelView (javafx.scene.Group root, int heartsToDisplay)
      Constructs a new LevelView.
      Parameters:
      root - the Group to which all level elements are added.
      heartsToDisplay - the number of hearts to display for the player's health.

  • Method Details

    • initializeBackground

      protected void initializeBackground (javafx.scene.image.Image... backgroundImages)
      Initializes the rolling background for the level using the specified images.
      Parameters:
      backgroundImages - the images to use for the background.

    • initializeUI

      public void initializeUI()
      Initializes the level's UI elements, including health, score, progress bar, and FPS display.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the level's UI elements to their initial state.

    • updateHealth

      public void updateHealth (int health)
      Updates the player's health in the heart display.
      Parameters:
      health - the current health value to display.

    • updateScore

      public void updateScore (int score)
      Updates the player's score in the score label.
      Parameters:
      score - the current score to display.

    • updateProgress

      public void updateProgress (double targetProgress, double durationInSeconds)
      Updates the progress bar with a new value over a specified duration.
      Parameters:
      targetProgress - the target progress value (0 to 1).
      durationInSeconds - the duration over which the progress bar should update.

    • updateFPS

      public void updateFPS (double fps)
      Updates the displayed FPS value.
      Parameters:
      fps - the current frames per second value to display.

    • addActor

      public void addActor (ActiveActorDestructible actor)
      Adds an actor to the level's root group if it's not already present.
      Parameters:
      actor - the ActiveActorDestructible to add.

    • removeActor

      public void removeActor (ActiveActorDestructible actor)
      Removes an actor from the level's root group.
      Parameters:
      actor - the ActiveActorDestructible to remove.

    • updateActor

      public void updateActor (ActiveActorDestructible actor, double deltaTime)
      Updates the visual state of an actor and removes it if it's destroyed.
      Parameters:
      actor - the ActiveActorDestructible to update.
      deltaTime - the time elapsed since the last update, in seconds.

    • pause

      public void pause()
      Pauses the level, including stopping any background animations.

      public void resume()
      Resumes the level, including restarting any background animations.
